name: Diagnosis: Zombie
description:
In a world where a third World War is on the rise, Zombies have overflown the streets and the hour of mankind's demise is no longer a matter of if... but rather when. Every single human left is being drafted to fight the great war against Zombies and other nations.

You too have been drafted and are now ready to take your psychology examination to determine your ability to fight in the war. The only problem is... you are a Zombie.

Can you convince the shrink that you are in fact human and therefore avoid the Zombie death squads? But at the same time avoid getting shipped out into war and certain death on the front lines?

This is Diagnosis: Zombie.

Developed during the LiU Spring Game Jam 2016.

Music credits: Cool Vibes Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
